Item.Name: Funnel Cakes at Disney's Typhoon Lagoon Water Park
Item.Content:
Funnel Cakes in Disney's Typhoon Lagoon Water Park, Disney's Typhoon Lagoon, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Funnel Cakes

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002314.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Discover the powdery sweet, fruit-covered goodness of the funnel cake, a mouthwatering favorite for all ages!
  Cuisine: American

Item.Name: Happy Landings Ice Cream
Item.Content:
Happy Landings Ice Cream in Disney's Typhoon Lagoon Water Park, Disney's Typhoon Lagoon, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Happy Landings Ice Cream

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001734.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Drift by for root beer floats, sundaes and other treats at this hut tucked beside Castaway Creek. Or grab a “shovel” and dig in to a Sand Pail—2 kinds of soft-serve topped with waffle cone and cookie pieces, hot fudge, sprinkles and more!
  Cuisine: American

WDWNT Reviews

Item.Name: Leaning Palms
Item.Content:
Leaning Palms in Disney's Typhoon Lagoon Water Park, Disney's Typhoon Lagoon, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Leaning Palms

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001800.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Leaning toward a quick bite and a beer? Find all that and more here: Angus burgers, chicken nuggets, pizza, hot dogs, sandwiches, salads and wraps! Plus, wet your whistle with an assortment of beverages, including a featured ale and wine.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: Let's Go Slurpin'
Item.Content:
Let's Go Slurpin' in Disney's Typhoon Lagoon Water Park, Disney's Typhoon Lagoon, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Let's Go Slurpin'

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001805.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Shimmy over to this shack on the beach and loudly inhale surfside specials frozen or on the rocks, select beers or any drink from the full bar menu. Try the rum-based Miss Tilly or the frozen mango margarita, made with Patron silver.
  Cuisine: American

WDWNT Reviews

Coming soon!

Item.Name: Lowtide Lou's
Item.Content:
Lowtide Lou's in Disney's Typhoon Lagoon Water Park, Disney's Typhoon Lagoon, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Lowtide Lou's

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001831.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Drop into Lou’s when the tide is low and buoy your appetite with a selection of wraps and sandwiches, each served with chips. Or, just kick back and relax as you soak up some suds—including beer, wine and frozen cocktails. Open seasonally.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: Snack Shack
Item.Content:
Snack Shack in Disney's Typhoon Lagoon Water Park, Disney's Typhoon Lagoon, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Snack Shack

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002146.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
After making waves in the Typhoon Lagoon Surf Pool, hang 10 over to this walk-up window for some on-the-go grub—like sandwiches, salads and more—or tasty sweets and ice cream treats. Adults can even chill out with a frozen alcoholic beverage!
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: Typhoon Tilly's
Item.Content:
Typhoon Tilly's in Disney's Typhoon Lagoon Water Park, Disney's Typhoon Lagoon, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Typhoon Tilly's

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002324.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Steer your crew toward this shipwreck-inspired eatery to find featured items like fried shrimp, fish baskets, BBQ pork sandwiches and chicken wraps. A perfect storm of dessert items, soft drinks, draft beer and wine are also available.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted
